Text: Tiber Island (District of Columbia):  The canals have since been filled in, rejoining the island to the mainland.

2:
--------------------
Text: Tiber Island (District of Columbia):  The Southwest Waterfront, Buzzard Point, National Mall, and L'Enfant Plaza areas were once on the island; at that time, their isolation from "the mainland" led to the area's colloquial nickname as "The Island."
Triplets:<Tiber Island
